Code: EXEC SQL SELECT OCORHIST, LIMCRR, OPERACAO, VAL_OPERACAO, DTMOVTO, CODUSU FROM seguros.v1histsini WHERE (NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND OPERACAO IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1050,4101,4120,4240,4241,4280,4281) AND DTMOVTO <= '2015-11-01') OR (NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND OPERACAO IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1050,4100,4120,4240,4241,4280,4281) AND DTMOVTO > '2015-11-01') OR (NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND OPERACAO = 4010 AND CODUSU <> 'RESSARC' AND NOM_PROGRAMA IS NULL) ORDER BY LIMCRR DESC, DTMOVTO DESC END SQL
